blog.name: bmgmw
blog.title: it's all about perspective
blog.description: 27. F. Bi. Hodgepodge of AM, GoT, ODAAT, AWAE, GMW, B99, TGP and whatever else I end up getting sucked into 📺ask box open :)

summary: The andi mack fandom is worse than the GMW fandom about fighting and discourse agree or disagree?
question: The andi mack fandom is worse than the GMW fandom about fighting and discourse agree or disagree?
answer:
GMW was worse because it had legitimate issues (I’m talking about the 40 year old women who wrote pieces about how Maya is a bitch or who would thirst over Peyton Meyer when he was like 16 at time, or the weird group of teen girls who bullied people and whose irl behavior was so shitty they got banned from the GMW set). Granted, these people were a small minority, but….yikes.

AM hasn’t experienced anything like that (as far as I know) but the fandom is certainly nothing like it was back in S1 (back when it was actually a friendom). There’s definitely a increase in freaking out and drama over stuff. And…..don’t @ me, I think Josh is a cool kid, but I think him being so involved in the fandom, particularly in the way he’s so messy with it a lot of the time, sometimes exacerbates issues the tag already has. Mainly when people start acting like whatever he posts is the end all be all.

So tldr: GMW tag had more serious issues, but it was a specific, small minority of users, and AM tag is more broadly annoying

(but there’s positive aspects to both fandoms! I only talked about the negatives because that’s what the anon was asking about)

tags: someone end this hiatus to get me to stop making stupid shit like this
summary: Andi Mack Characters from Most to Least Likely to Be/Have Been a Republican
body:
Andi Mack Characters from Most to Least Likely to Be/Have Been a Republican

Marty- listen. He’s a straight, white boy who says shit like “it’s biology that men are faster and stronger”

REED- his dad owns guns. He thinks guns are cool. Probably would be a member of the NRA if he were old enough

Celia- very concerned with public appearances, wants to fit into suburban life. Probably voted for McCain but not Romney. A true moderate. Socially liberal but fiscally conservative

Iris- she seems like that quiet girl in the young republicans who is only a republican bc her parents are— she becomes much more liberal once she actually starts learning about politics

TJ- similar to Marty, except not straight. His parents are also really conservative. He grows out of that shit REAL fast and becomes a leftist

Amber- “can’t poor people just get a better job? I don’t see why we would pay fast food workers $15 an hour”. She VERY quickly turns into a lesbian communist icon, even if her republican parents hate it

Jonah- it’s not likely that he’s a republican, but he’s definitely friends with republicans. fiscally conservative

Buffy- can’t stand Marty or his politics. Probably has a poster of RBG in her room

Andi- not conservative at all but is a little afraid of radical philosophy. Calls herself a moderate until she gets real into socialism the deeper into the art community she gets

Bowie- probably a member of the Green Party. Hates corporate America

Bex- FUCK the bourgeoisie and fuck you mom. TRUE punk icon

Walker- started a communist revolution in his preschool class. ABSOLUTE ICON

blog.name: tjswings
blog.title: Of Course I Came
blog.description: Tyrus Shipper. DJ Fruity Stan. AM Enthusiast.  i write fics and obsess over details, join me

summary: How have you been over the hiatus?
question: How have you been over the hiatus?
answer:
Pretty good since I’ve been on holiday, haha. I’ve had limited time on tumblr which is probably for the best considering all the different snippits of drama and discourse I’ve been hearing about.

I get home only 3 days before the new episode and I had a ton of work/finals all December so it’s basically like a very short hiatus for me!

I hope everyone’s been doing alright through everything and a reminder that you should take a break from a fandom every now and then! If nothing is happening/too much is happening, take a step away. Even if that means just closing your computer and reading a book for a few hours, or going out to lunch with a friend or family member, it can help a lot

summary: as soon as the new ep comes out will you be uploading it to mega right away like you did last time? bc torrent sites don’t...
question: as soon as the new ep comes out will you be uploading it to mega right away like you did last time? bc torrent sites don’t updated it until it airs live usually so i just want to make sure i’ll have somewhere to watch it
answer: Yup I’ll be uploading it best I can. I’m home for a few weeks so I’m not sure what that means for my WiFi tbh. I was doing it all on dorm WiFi before so it might be faster at home. Ill keep everyone updated though, it’ll definitely be going up!

blog.title: Of Course I Came
blog.description: Tyrus Shipper. DJ Fruity Stan. AM Enthusiast.  i write fics and obsess over details, join me

summary: do you think they would ever consider shooting some new scenes to fill in the gaps they cut with ham?? (which i am so so sad...
question: do you think they would ever consider shooting some new scenes to fill in the gaps they cut with ham?? (which i am so so sad about sksfsdjlk i loved the character of ham,,, ugh why did stoney haVE TO DO THAT) i know that movie studios do this a lot (they did with avengers four), but idk if disney would ever do reshoots so i just wanted to hear your opinion
answer:
No I don’t think they’ll reshoot. If they were going to they would have decided right after the incident to do so and extended filming. Since they’ve completely wrapped, they wouldn’t all be called back to do a reshoot for a few scenes.

The fact that they didn’t reshoot the finale when it would have been the easiest to do so is pretty telling.

That being said idk how much dead air he will end up leaving, I hope they find some way to just extended the content they already have (fewer cuts) than making the episodes shorter. But, like Josh said, the 33min finale was already cut down drastically without him, so could be the case for other episodes.

BUT it would likely compromise a mostly Celia based plot and some Bex and Andi which is probably why they don’t feel the need to reshoot. Andi GHC scenes would almost never have Ham written into them in the first place

blog.name: my-ao3feed-trial
blog.title: ao3feed trial
blog.description: just a blog where I try to figure out how to set an ao3feed

summary: The Evolution of Love
title: The Evolution of Love
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2smWuV1

by RJW

It all starts with a muffin. A muffin you’re going to miss out on, because you don’t know how to stand up for yourself in the school cafeteria and it’s just incredibly annoying that they don’t bake enough of them for the number of students that’s craving them. Suddenly he’s there, entering your life like a strike of lightning. He gives you that little push to get that last muffin, and he’s there for you, saying that he’s with you. You may not know it now, but you’re going to be head over heels with this boy. It’s going to be far more than a simple crush, but at the moment, you’re not realizing this yet.

Words: 3780, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Andi Mack (TV)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Cyrus Goodman, T.J. Kippen
  • Relationships: Cyrus Goodman/T. J. Kippen, Cyrus Goodman & T. J. Kippen
  • Additional Tags: One Shot, Fluff and Angst, Falling In Love, Romance, Drama & Romance, Coming Out, Teenage Drama, Awkwardness, Awkward Crush, Crushes, Tyrus is Endgame


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2smWuV1

by RJW

It all starts with a muffin. A muffin you’re going to miss out on, because you don’t know how to stand up for yourself in the school cafeteria and it’s just incredibly annoying that they don’t bake enough of them for the number of students that’s craving them. Suddenly he’s there, entering your life like a strike of lightning. He gives you that little push to get that last muffin, and he’s there for you, saying that he’s with you. You may not know it now, but you’re going to be head over heels with this boy. It’s going to be far more than a simple crush, but at the moment, you’re not realizing this yet.

summary: In the Lizzie McGuire episode First Kiss when Lizzie tells Miranda about liking the paper boy, she says “His name is Ronnie and...
body:
In the Lizzie McGuire episode First Kiss when Lizzie tells Miranda about liking the paper boy, she says “His name is Ronnie and he goes to Jefferson”.

Even though the show is so obviously filmed in Southern California, as far as I can remember, the characters never state where they live, so let’s just make the Jefferson that Lizzie mentions be the same middle school the Andi Mack kids now go to and make those crossover dreams come

(@ Terri Minsky )

blog.name: butterfly-honey
blog.title: €|
blog.description: 👼🏽Multi fandom👼🏽

summary: Andi Mack
body:
Andi Mack

Is for the parents that want their kids to be exsposed to diversity and the real ness of the show.

For the little kids that watch Disney channel.

For the teenagers seeing representation.

For the young and old adults admiring the show because there wasn’t shows like this before.

It’s for everyone. And so is the fandom.

All we’re saying is that making it weird and sexual for the younger kids and the older ones Is not ok. it doesn’t matter what you said or what you didn’t this show IS meant to be light-hearted and inspirational.

Yes it does have the relationship drama and the friendship drama, but that’s just showing that friends can go threw obstacles and that relationships can be for everyone. White, black Asian, gay, straight.

All the serious topics they tackle are realistic to a 13-15 year olds day to day life. They’re promoting how to deal with these things by showing the characters deal with it. Ex) peer pressure, panic attacks, teen pregnancy.

So if they did show anything about sex then that would be promoting sex to a tween age group which should not be in any way in their day to day lives.

You don’t have to agree but 🤷‍♂️

Also if you have anything else to say please add on
